Text: My deepest sympathy's to you and your family.
My condolences, brother. Thank you for all that you do.
My sincerest condolences, Quazza.  Take all the time you need.  I'm sure I speak (type) for everyone here and thank you immensely for all you do to spread the conservative word.

Thanks for the comments.

I know that the people who download, actually care. Glenn Beck listeners are some of the greatest and nicest people I've ever met.

I appreciate it greatly.

Hey Quazza, how do you get the itunes version of the 4th hour - i can't find it anywhere on the website that isn't streaming. I purchased the extreme package for myself, my best way to give back to glenn 

thanks for getting me into the daily radio show, though!

Deepest condolences to you and your family.  Speaking for myself only, I can't express how much your efforts are appreciated.  Even with all you have going on, you took time to to get this out for all of us.  I regret that I so infrequently thank you, but the gratitude is there everytime I pull down one of your torrents.
The Daily Show with Jon Stewart episode from this day was a heck of a lot better
